articles.title: Antarctica is covered in volcanoes, could they erupt? - Livescience.com
articles.description: Antarctica's western ice sheet alone contains 138 volcanos.
articles.content:
Antarctica
 is perhaps best known for its endless expanse of ice and snow. But what many people don't realize is that hiding beneath its frosty facade are dozens of volcanoes

articles.title: After five months of debugging, NASA finally knows why Voyager 1 sends gibberish data - Neowin
articles.description: For several months, the most distant human-made object, the Voyager 1, sends unusable engineering and science data. NASA engineers now pinpointed the cause and are working on a solution.
